title: GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_TIRE_COLLIDER_WIDTH
content:
0xEF65929C// GetVehicleWheelTireColliderWidth
float GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_TIRE_COLLIDER_WIDTH(Vehicle vehicle, int wheelIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to obtain data for.wheelIndex: Index of wheel, 0-3.Returns: Float representing width of the wheel collider.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_TIRE_COLLIDER_WIDTH
GetVehicleWheelTireColliderWidth(vehicle, 0)
